00098 list_block * config_createlistblock(){
00099 
00100     list_block * new = (list_block *)malloc(sizeof(list_block));
00101     (*new)=NULL;
00102     return new;
00103 
00104 }
00105 
00109 type_block * config_createblock(char * blockname,list_affect * list){
00110     
00111     type_block * new = (type_block *)malloc(sizeof(type_block));
00112     strncpy(new->name,blockname,MAXSTRLEN);
00113     new->list_def=(*list);
00114     new->next=NULL;
00115     
00116     return new;
00117     
00118 }
00119 
00123 void config_addblock( list_block * list,type_block * block){
00124     
00125     if (!(*list)){
00126         (*list)=block;
00127     } else {
00128         block->next=(*list);
00129         (*list)=block;
00130     }
00131     
00132 }
00133 
00134 
00138 list_affect * config_createlistaffect(){
00139     
00140     list_affect * new = (list_affect *)malloc(sizeof(list_affect));
00141     (*new)=NULL;
00142     return new;
00143 
00144 }
00145 
00149 type_affect * config_createaffect(char * varname,char * varval){
00150     
00151     type_affect * new = (type_affect *)malloc(sizeof(type_affect));
00152     strncpy(new->varname,varname,MAXSTRLEN);
00153     strncpy(new->varvalue,varval,MAXSTRLEN);
00154     new->next=NULL;
00155     
00156     return new;
00157 
00158 }
00159 
00160 
00164 void config_adddef(list_affect * list,type_affect * affect){
00165     if (!(*list)){
00166         (*list)=affect;
00167     } else {
00168         affect->next=(*list);
00169         (*list)=affect;
00170 }
00171 
00172     }

00174 
00178 void config_print_list( FILE * output, list_block * list ){
00179     
00180     type_block * curr_block;
00181     type_affect * curr_aff;
00182     
00183     /* sanity check */
00184     if (!list) return;
00185     
00186     curr_block=(*list);
00187     
00188     while (curr_block){
00189         
00190         fprintf(output,"BLOCK '%s'\n",curr_block->name);
00191         
00192         curr_aff=curr_block->list_def;
00193         
00194         while (curr_aff){
00195             
00196             fprintf(output,"\t KEY : '%s', VALUE : '%s'\n",curr_aff->varname,curr_aff->varvalue);
00197             
00198             curr_aff=curr_aff->next;
00199         }
00200         
00201         fprintf(output,"\n");
00202         
00203         curr_block=curr_block->next;
00204     }
00205     
00206         
00207 }
00208 
00209 
00210 
00211 static void free_block( type_block * block ){
00212   
00213     type_affect * curr_aff;
00214     type_affect * next_aff;
00215     
00216     curr_aff = block->list_def;
00217     
00218     while (curr_aff){
00219       
00220       next_aff = curr_aff->next;
00221       free( curr_aff );
00222       curr_aff = next_aff;
00223           
00224     }
00225     
00226     free( block );
00227     
00228     return ;
00229   
00230 }
00231 
00232 
00233 
00238 void config_free_list(list_block * list){
00239   
00240     type_block * curr_block;
00241     type_block * next_block;
00242     
00243     curr_block=(*list);
00244     
00245     while (curr_block){
00246       
00247       next_block = curr_block->next;      
00248       free_block( curr_block );
00249       curr_block = next_block;
00250         
00251     }
00252     
00253     free( list );
00254     return ;
00255   
00256 }
